parameters.name: OSType
parameters.description:
The operating system type of the instance. Valid values:

*   Windows
*   Linux

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. If you specify **InstanceId**, this parameter does not take effect. Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
